content: short-row 9 and 10 2 more times 5 6 6 sts along underarm cast on sts k62 68 73 79 82 92 99 107 sts from sleeve and then next round rs knit back to bor marker sm pick up and knit 4 4 4 4 5 5 5 5 sts along un- then knit 1 round concealing wrapped sts as you derarm cast on to centre pm to mark bor - 70 come to them 76 82 88 92 102 110 118 sts divide for body work 7 5 5 3 3 3 3 3 rnds even next round leave bor marker in place k48 54 59 65 70 76 81 87 place next 62 68 73 79 decrease round k1 ssk knit to 3 sts from end k2tog 82 92 99 107 sts for right sleeve onto waste k1 2 sts decrease d yarn or holder using the backwards loop repeat decrease round every 6th 6th 6th 6th 6th 4th method cast-on 8 8 9 9 10 10 11 11 stitches 4th 4th round 10 7 5 2 2 19 19 16 more times for the underarm k96 107 118 129 140 151 162 then every 4th 4th 4th 4th 4th 2nd 2nd 2nd 173 place next 62 68 73 79 82 92 99 107 sts round 2 7 11 16 17 4 6 12 more times 44 46 for left sleeve onto waste yarn or holder using 48 50 52 54 58 60 sts the backwards loop method cast-on 8 8 9 9 10 10 11 11 stitches for the underarm k to end at the same time when a total of 42 40 45 45 4 49 53 58 56 rnds have been worked from the underarm cast on break yarn c and continue with one strand each of yarns a and d held to- gether throughout work even until sleeve measures 11 1/4 11 1/4 11 3/4 11 3/4 12 1/4 12 3/4 13 1/4 13 1/4 / 28 5 28 5 30 30 31 32 5 33 5 33 5 cm from under- arm or 3/4 / 2 cm less than desired length to end of sleeve sleeve cuff change to 3 75 mm us 5 dpns or shorter cir- cular needle and work as follows round 1 k1 p1 to end repeat round 1 until cuff measures 3/4 / 2 cm bind off evenly in k1 p1 rib repeat for other sleeve finishing weave in ends closing any gaps that remain and block to measurements 5 ©2021 eweknit version 1 april 2021 questions email info@eweknit ca wwws eweknit ca ~ instagram eweknitto share finished projects by hashtagging #eweknitprojects
